title: DATA DESTRUCTION WORKSHOP COMING SOON
preview: A workshop exploring the ethical and practical implications of data destruction in the digital age. Participants will learn about different methods of secure data deletion and discuss the importance of data privacy in research contexts.

objectives.title: OBJECTIVES:
objectives.content: To develop best practices for data destruction in research contexts and raise awareness about the importance of data privacy.

methodology.title: METHODOLOGY:
methodology.content: Workshop sessions, practical demonstrations, and group discussions

lessons.title: INSIGHTS GAINED:
content: Data destruction is a critical component of research ethics
Different types of data require different destruction methods
Institutional policies often lag behind technological capabilities
